steps.title: Step 1
steps.details: Select the payment channel as "Internet Banking Payment", enter the amount, and click "Submit"

steps.title: Step 3
steps.details: Select a bank and click Next

steps.title: Step 4
steps.details: Fill in the personal information according to the prompt information on the bank interface and complete the recharge

steps.title: Step 1

steps.title: Step 3

steps.title: Step 1
steps.details: Login with your WIN1account and click Withdraw.

steps.title: Step 2
steps.details:
Fill in the required fields shown on the page.
1. Bank Name: Select the bank where you want to withdraw your funds into.
2. Account Name: Enter your name as written in your bank card.
3. Account no.: Enter the number written in your bank card.
Finally, click Confirm.

steps.title: Step 3
steps.details:
Fill in the amount to withdraw.
1. My Bank Cards: Select the card where you want to withdraw your funds into.
2. Amount: Enter the amount youw want to withdraw.
3. Password: Enter your fund password.
Finally, click Submit
